question.question: What is the primary indication for an electroencephalogram (EEG) in cases of malaise or loss of consciousness presumed to be of epileptic origin?
question.option_b: To evaluate the possibility of an epileptic seizure
question.option_c: To monitor the effects of medication
question.option_d: To investigate symptoms of a stroke
